mapper.select: select count(*) from askrecord where time > #{time}
select * from askrecord order by time desc
select * from askrecord order by time desc limit #{offset},#{limit}
select * from askrecord where issuccess=#{issuccess} order by time asc limit #{offset},#{limit}
select * from askrecord where time > #{time} order by issuccess desc
mapper.insert: insert ignore askrecord (id, name, phone, type, time,functions,issuccess,description) values (#{id},#{name}, #{phone}, #{type}, #{time},#{functions},#{issuccess},#{description})
mapper.update: update askrecord set name=#{name}, phone=#{phone}, type=#{type}, time=#{time}, functions=#{functions}, issuccess=#{issuccess}, description=#{description} where id=#{id}
